info.title: ManagedResolverManagementClient
info.description: The Managed DNS Resolver Management Client.

put.description: Creates or updates a managed DNS resolver. Does not modify virtual network or ruleset associated with the resolver.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The managed DNS resolver has been created.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver upsert operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a managed DNS resolver. Does not modify virtual network or ruleset associated with the resolver.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver update operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a managed DNS resolver. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone. This operation does not delete or modify the virtual network or ruleset associated with the resolver.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver has been deleted.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver delete operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The managed DNS resolver was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a managed DNS resolver properties.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the managed DNS resolvers within a resource group.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the managed DNS resolvers in all resource groups in a subscription.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a managed DNS resolver endpoint.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint has been created.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint has been updated.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint upsert operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a managed DNS resolver endpoint.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint has been updated.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint update operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a managed DNS resolver endpoint. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint has been deleted.

202.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint delete operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a managed DNS resolver endpoint properties.

200.description: The managed DNS resolver endpoint was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the endpoints for the specified managed DNS resolver.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a ruleset link to managed DNS resolver.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver has been created.

200.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The operation to create ruleset link to managed DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a ruleset link to managed DNS resolver.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update ruleset link to managed DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a ruleset link to managed DNS resolver. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver has been deleted.

202.description: The operation to delete ruleset link to managed DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets properties of a ruleset link to managed DNS resolver.

200.description: The ruleset link to the managed DNS resolver was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists ruleset links to a specified managed DNS resolver.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a managed resolver ruleset. Does not modify rules within the ruleset.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The managed resolver ruleset has been created.

200.description: The managed resolver ruleset has been updated.

202.description: The managed resolver ruleset upsert operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a managed resolver ruleset. Does not modify rules within the ruleset.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The managed resolver ruleset has been updated.

202.description: The managed resolver ruleset update operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a managed resolver ruleset. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone. All rules within the ruleset will also be deleted.

200.description: The managed resolver ruleset has been deleted.

202.description: The managed resolver ruleset delete operation has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The managed resolver ruleset was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a managed resolver ruleset properties.

200.description: The managed resolver ruleset was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the managed resolver rulesets within a resource group.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the managed resolver rulesets in all resource groups in a subscription.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

put.description: Creates or updates a managed resolver rule in the specified ruleset.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The managed resolver rule has been created.

200.description: The managed resolver rule has been updated.

202.description: The operation to upsert managed resolver rule has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

patch.description: Updates a managed resolver rule in the specified ruleset.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The managed resolver rule has been updated.

202.description: The operation to add managed resolver rule for Managed DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a managed resolver rule in the specified rulset. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The managed resolver rule has been deleted.

202.description: The operation to delete managed resolver rule has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The managed resolver rule was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Gets a managed resolver rule properties in the specified ruleset.

200.description: The managed resolver rule was found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

get.description: Lists the managed resolver rules in the specified ruleset.

200.description: The operation succeeded.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

ManagedResolverProperties.description: Represents the properties of a managed DNS resolver.

virtualNetwork.description: The reference to the virtual network. This cannot be changed after creation.

maxNumberOfEndpoints.description: The maximum number of endpoints that can be created for this managed DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfEndpoints.description: The current number of endpoints for this managed DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

managedResolverState.description: The status of the managed DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the managed DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

etag.description: The ETag of the managed DNS resolver.

properties.description: Properties of a managed DNS resolver.

ManagedResolverListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on managed DNS resolvers.

value.description: Enumeration of the managed DNS resolvers.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

EndpointProperties.description: Represents the properties of a managed DNS resolver endpoint.

subnet.description: The reference to the subnet used for IP configurations.

endpointState.description: The status of the endpoint. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the managed DNS resolver endpoint. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

Endpoint.description: Describes a managed DNS resolver endpoint.

etag.description: The ETag of the managed DNS resolver endpoint.

properties.description: Properties of a managed DNS resolver endpoint.

EndpointListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on managed DNS resolver endpoints.

value.description: Enumeration of the managed DNS resolver endpoints.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

ManagedResolverRulesetLinkProperties.description: Represents the properties of a ruleset links to a managed DNS resolver.

managedResolverRuleset.description: The reference to the managed resolver ruleset. This cannot be changed after creation.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the managed DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

ManagedResolverRulesetLink.description: Describes a ruleset links to managed DNS resolver.

etag.description: The ETag of the ruleset link to managed DNS resolver.

properties.description: Properties of a ruleset links to managed DNS resolver.

ManagedResolverRulesetLinkListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on ruleset links to managed DNS resolver.

value.description: Enumeration of the ruleset links to managed DNS resolver.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

ManagedResolverRulesetProperties.description: Represents the properties of a managed resolver ruleset.

maxNumberOfManagedResolverRules.description: The maximum number of managed resolver rules that can be created in this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfManagedResolverRules.description: The current number of managed resolver rules in this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

maxNumberOfManagedResolverLinks.description: The maximum number of managed DNS resolvers that can be linked to this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfManagedResolverLinks.description: The current number of managed DNS resolvers that are linked to this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

etag.description: The ETag of the managed resolver ruleset.

properties.description: Properties of a managed resolver ruleset.

ManagedResolverRulesetListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on managed resolver rulesets.

value.description: Enumeration of the managed resolver rulesets.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

ManagedResolverRuleProperties.description: Represents the properties of a managed resolver rule within the ruleset.

action.description: The action to take as part of rule execution. Use 'Forward' to route the DNS queries for the domain to servers specified as part of `targetDnsServers` property. Use 'Default' to render default behavior (skipping managed resolver rule execution) for the specified domain. This value cannot be changed after the rule has been created.

targetDnsServers.description: Enumeration of DNS servers to forward the DNS query to. This property is only applicable when the managed resolver rule `type` is set to 'Forward'.

disabled.description: Is the managed resolver rule disabled? Allows users to disable a specific rule without deleting it.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the managed resolver rule. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

ManagedResolverRule.description: Describes a managed resolver rule within a ruleset.

etag.description: The ETag of the managed resolver rule.

properties.description: Properties of a managed resolver rule within the ruleset.

ManagedResolverRuleListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on managed resolver rules within a ruleset.

value.description: Enumeration of the managed resolver rules within a ruleset.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

IpConfiguration.description: Managed DNS resolver endpoint IP configuration

privateIpAddress.description: Private IP address for the IP configuration.

ProvisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the resource.

TargetDnsServer.description: Describes a server to forward the DNS queries to.

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Example - '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/managedResolvers/{managedResolverName}'.

type.description: The type of the resource. Example - 'Microsoft.Network/managedResolvers'.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for an ARM proxy resource.

CloudErrorBody.description: The body of an error message

message.description: A description of what caused the error

target.description: The target resource of the error message

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ManagedResolverNameParameter.name: managedResolverName
ManagedResolverNameParameter.description: The name of the managed DNS resolver.

EndpointNameParameter.name: endpointName
EndpointNameParameter.description: The name of the managed DNS resolver endpoint.

ManagedResolverRulesetLinkNameParameter.name: managedResolverRulesetLinkName
ManagedResolverRulesetLinkNameParameter.description: The name of the managed ruleset link.

ManagedResolverRulesetNameParameter.name: managedResolverRulesetName
ManagedResolverRulesetNameParameter.description: The name of the managed resolver ruleset.

ManagedResolverRuleNameParameter.name: managedResolverRuleName
ManagedResolverRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the managed resolver rule.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of results to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 results.

IfMatchParameter.name: If-Match
IfMatchParameter.description: The ETag of the resource. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

IfNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatchParameter.description: Set to '*' to allow a new resource to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will be ignored.
